name: First Doctor
description: The original, a crotchety but brilliant scientist who began the journey.

name: Second Doctor
description: A 'cosmic hobo' with a playful exterior and a fiercely moral core.

name: Third Doctor
description: A man of action and a dandy, exiled to Earth and working with UNIT.

name: Fourth Doctor
description: Known for his iconic long scarf, wild hair, and love for jelly babies.

name: Fifth Doctor
description: A youthful, cricket-loving Doctor with a more vulnerable and sensitive side.

name: Sixth Doctor
description: Known for his flamboyant, multi-colored coat and a brash, arrogant personality that mellowed over time.

name: Seventh Doctor
description: Started as a clownish figure but evolved into a cunning and manipulative chessmaster.

name: Eighth Doctor
description: A romantic and enthusiastic Doctor who appeared in a TV movie, bridging the classic and modern eras.

name: War Doctor
description: The forgotten incarnation who fought in the Last Great Time War. 'No More.'

name: Fugitive Doctor
description: A previously unknown incarnation of the Doctor who worked for the Division. She is a reminder of a life the Doctor had forgotten.

name: Ninth Doctor
description: The sole survivor of the Time War, he brought the show back with a darker edge. "Fantastic!"

name: Tenth Doctor
description: A charismatic and energetic Doctor known for his pinstripe suit and "Allons-y!".

name: Eleventh Doctor
description: The "madman with a box," famous for his bow ties and fezzes.

name: Twelfth Doctor
description: A more severe and contemplative Doctor, often questioning his own morality. Known for his electric guitar.

name: Thirteenth Doctor
description: The first female incarnation, bringing hope and a renewed sense of wonder.

name: Fourteenth Doctor
description: A familiar face returned, revisiting old favorites before a unique 'bi-generation'.

name: Fifteenth Doctor
description: A vibrant and stylish Doctor, embracing a new era of adventure with a fresh perspective.
